title: spazzdla
author: spazzdla
content: Are all sites like this pretty much dead now?

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: spazzdla on December 10, 2023, 02:02:10 PMAre all sites like this pretty much dead now?Head over to the deep web or dark web. You certainly won't find them here on the clearnet. People are so skeptical about such sites as they are getting seized more than often by authorities who might have infiltrated a number of them as well as investigations keep growing deeper. But since the shutdown of Silk Road, there have been a number of alternatives which have also been seized time and again.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Do you think people will stop selling or buying such things that only can be found on sites like silk roads? I don't think so. That's why there are still lot of alternatives of silk roads, idk the specific name and onion URL though.Just be safe because that's what every authority are targeting, well, with your status i knew you already such thing.
